description: The Congress will “expose” the Modi government over its alleged failure on various fronts in the last four years and will observe May 26 as
title: Congress to observe ‘betrayal day’ on May 26 to mark anniversary of Modi government
title_page: Congress to observe ‘betrayal day’ on May 26 to mark anniversary of Modi government - Worldnews.com
text:
The Congress will “expose” the Modi government over its alleged failure on various fronts in the last four years and will observe May 26 as “Vishwasghat Divas” (Betrayal Day), party general secretary Ashok Gehlot said in New Delhi on Wednesday.
The party will mark four years of the completion of the Modi government with
